abstract: Google announced on Thursday that its Google Goggles application for Android-based mobile phones can now take photos of foreign languages and instantly translate them using Google’s free language services.
snippet: Google announced on Thursday that its Google Goggles application for Android-based mobile phones can now take photos of foreign languages and instantly translate them using Google’s free language services.
lead_paragraph: Watch any science fiction television show, including “Star Trek” and “Doctor Who,” and you will likely hear about a little gadget called a “Universal Translator.” This fictitious device could instantly translate two languages from anywhere in the galaxy.

headline.main: A Google Tool to Translate a French Menu
